name: behsseui
description: Add behsseui components to your projects

scripts.cli:publish: pnpm cli:build && cd packages/cli && npm publish
scripts.cli:publish:patch: cd packages/cli && npm version patch && cd ../.. && pnpm cli:publish
scripts.cli:publish:minor: cd packages/cli && npm version minor && cd ../.. && pnpm cli:publish
scripts.cli:publish:major: cd packages/cli && npm version major && cd ../.. && pnpm cli:publish
